Description.Text: Situated on the picturesque bay of Stalis in Hersonissos village the hotel Horizon Beach Stalis is ideal for an enjoyable holiday in Crete. Most rooms have a view of the blue crystal waters of the Aegean Sea and swimming pools of the hotel. There is a private platform with direct access to the sea and it is located only 300m from the nearest organized beach. The traditional architecture, the sunny gardens and squares and modern facilities ensure idyllic and relaxing moments.Free Pool Umbrellas, Free Pool Chairs.

The Hotel is centrally located only 1 km from the center of Stalis, 30 km from the International Airport of Heraklion and 3km each way from the resorts of Malia and Hersonissos, both internationally known tourist destinations. The golden sandy beaches of Stalis and the abundance of shops, bars, restaurants and taverns are only a short walk away.
Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available at the property.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
